mapper.select: select c.*, m.nickname from comments c join members m on c.members_id = m.id where c.boards_id = #{boards_id} order by case when c.reparent = 0 then c.id else c.reparent end;
mapper.insert: insert into comments (content, members_id, boards_id, created_at, reparent) values (#{content}, #{members_id}, #{boards_id}, now(), #{reparent});
mapper.update: update comments set content = #{content}, updated_at = now() where id = #{id} and del_yn = "N"
update comments set del_yn = "Y" where id = #{id}
